per_frame_1=rot=rot + 0.123 * sin (0.888 * time);
per_frame_2=mv_r=mv_r+.5*sin(time);
per_frame_3=mv_b=mv_b-.5*sin(time*.13);
per_frame_4=mv_g=mv_g+.5*sin(time+1);
per_frame_5=wave_r=wave_r + 0.620 * sin (0.777 * time);
per_frame_6=wave_b=wave_b + 0.225 * sin (0.443 * time);
per_frame_7=wave_g=wave_g + 0.111 * sin (0.883 * time);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // feather pen
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1-8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_8=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1+8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // darken over time
warp_11=`    ret -= 0.034;
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*float2(-1,1) + 0.5;
comp_4=`ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_5=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_6=`                0.50 
comp_7=`              ); //video echo
comp_8=`ret = ret*1.3 - 0.1;
comp_9=`
comp_10=`
comp_11=`ret *= (hue_shader*8)-6.25;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`}
